DOC.brief_summary: ERCP plays an important role in management of common bile duct stones. Herein the investigators compare preoperative against intraoperative ERCP. 210 were included but only 198 patients were randomly divided into two groups; PES/LC (100 patients) and LC/IOES (98 patients). The total hospital stay were significantly shorter in the group of LC/IOES
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Pre and Intraoperative ERCP in Treatment of Common Bile Duct Stones
DOC.criteria: patients with gallstones and common bile duct stones contraindications to ercp contraindication to laparoscopy biliary pancreatitis refusal to participate
